cards.name: The Opportunity
cards.uprightMeaning: A new door opens. Recognition, promotion, or unexpected chance for growth.
cards.reversedMeaning: Missed chances, hesitation, or timing not yet right for advancement.

cards.name: The Mentor
cards.uprightMeaning: Guidance from experienced colleague. Learning, wisdom, professional development.
cards.reversedMeaning: Lack of support, need to trust your own judgment, self-reliance required.

cards.name: The Collaboration
cards.uprightMeaning: Teamwork, partnerships, synergy. Success through cooperation and shared goals.
cards.reversedMeaning: Conflict, miscommunication, or need to work independently for now.

cards.name: The Challenge
cards.uprightMeaning: Obstacles that build strength. Difficult project that leads to growth.
cards.reversedMeaning: Avoiding necessary difficulties, or challenge is lifting.

cards.name: The Balance
cards.uprightMeaning: Work-life harmony. Fair decisions, equilibrium between competing demands.
cards.reversedMeaning: Burnout, imbalance, need to reassess priorities.

cards.name: The Innovation
cards.uprightMeaning: Creative solutions, new approaches, breakthrough thinking.
cards.reversedMeaning: Sticking to old methods, resistance to change, creative block.

cards.name: The Leadership
cards.uprightMeaning: Taking charge, authority, responsibility. Time to lead.
cards.reversedMeaning: Micromanagement, abuse of power, or not ready to lead yet.

cards.name: The Transition
cards.uprightMeaning: Career change, transformation, ending one phase to begin another.
cards.reversedMeaning: Resistance to change, fear of unknown, clinging to familiar.

cards.name: The Success
cards.uprightMeaning: Achievement, recognition, goals reached. Celebration of accomplishments.
cards.reversedMeaning: Delayed success, need for patience, or redefining what success means.

cards.name: The Reflection
cards.uprightMeaning: Time to pause, assess, and plan. Strategic thinking needed.
cards.reversedMeaning: Overthinking, analysis paralysis, or avoiding necessary introspection.
